short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A quick access tool for Exness Official Website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This simple chrome Extension Provides you quick Access tool for Exness Official Website.

Steps to use this simple tool after installation:
✅    Click the Extension Icon
✅    Click the button "Visit Exness Official Site"
✅   You are done

The Exness website will open in new tab.
